-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | RAML style route definitions for Yesod
--   
@package yesod-raml
@version 0.1.0

module Yesod.Raml.Type
type HandlerHint = Text
type Handler = Text
type Path = Text
type Method = Text
type ResponseCode = Text
type ContentType = Text
data RamlResponseBody
RamlResponseBody :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> RamlResponseBody
res_schema :: RamlResponseBody -> Maybe Text
res_example :: RamlResponseBody -> Maybe Text
data RamlResponse
RamlResponse :: Maybe Text -> Map ContentType RamlResponseBody -> RamlResponse
res_description :: RamlResponse -> Maybe Text
res_body :: RamlResponse -> Map ContentType RamlResponseBody
data RamlMethod
RamlMethod :: Map ResponseCode RamlResponse -> RamlMethod
m_responses :: RamlMethod -> Map ResponseCode RamlResponse
data RamlResource
RamlResource :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Handler -> Map Method RamlMethod -> Map Path RamlResource -> RamlResource
r_displayName :: RamlResource -> Maybe Text
r_description :: RamlResource -> Maybe Text
r_handler :: RamlResource -> Maybe Handler
r_methods :: RamlResource -> Map Method RamlMethod
r_paths :: RamlResource -> Map Path RamlResource
data RamlDocumentation
RamlDocumentation :: Text -> Text -> RamlDocumentation
doc_title :: RamlDocumentation -> Text
doc_content :: RamlDocumentation -> Text
data Raml
Raml :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Maybe [RamlDocumentation] -> Map Path RamlResource -> Raml
title :: Raml -> Text
version :: Raml -> Text
baseUri :: Raml -> Text
documentation :: Raml -> Maybe [RamlDocumentation]
paths :: Raml -> Map Path RamlResource
data RamlRoute
RamlRoute :: [Path] -> Text -> [Method] -> RamlRoute
rr_pieces :: RamlRoute -> [Path]
rr_handler :: RamlRoute -> Text
rr_methods :: RamlRoute -> [Method]
instance Show RamlResponseBody
instance Eq RamlResponseBody
instance Ord RamlResponseBody
instance Show RamlResponse
instance Eq RamlResponse
instance Ord RamlResponse
instance Show RamlMethod
instance Eq RamlMethod
instance Ord RamlMethod
instance Show RamlResource
instance Eq RamlResource
instance Ord RamlResource
instance Show RamlDocumentation
instance Eq RamlDocumentation
instance Ord RamlDocumentation
instance Show Raml
instance Eq Raml
instance Ord Raml
instance Show RamlRoute
instance Eq RamlRoute
instance Ord RamlRoute

module Yesod.Raml.Parser
instance FromJSON Raml
instance FromJSON RamlDocumentation
instance FromJSON RamlResource
instance FromJSON RamlMethod
instance FromJSON RamlResponse
instance FromJSON RamlResponseBody

module Yesod.Raml.Routes
parseRamlRoutes :: QuasiQuoter
parseRamlRoutesFile :: FilePath -> Q Exp
